title: Saint Philip, Plate 5 from the series Christ, the Twelve Apostles, and Saint Paul
marks:
Signature, Inscription and Mark

LLC of the shee LLC of the image, in the print: [HG]
description: heavy-set man with hair over his ears, balding on top; man holds a crozier in PR hand, with PL hand on chest; book in front of man; text at bottom:  \"V. / DESCENDIT AD INFERNA, TER- / TIA DIE RESURREXIT A MOR- / TVIS.\"
creditline: The Winton Jones Endowment Fund for Prints and Drawings
